parameters.query:
INSERT INTO events (user_id, title, description, start_time, end_time, location, status, category_id, external_calendar_id)
VALUES ('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001', 
        '{{ $json.body.title }}', 
        '{{ $json.body.description }}', 
        '{{ $json.body.start_time }}', 
        '{{ $json.body.end_time }}',
        {{ $json.body.location ? "'" + $json.body.location + "'" : "NULL" }},
        '{{ $json.body.status || "scheduled" }}',
        (SELECT id FROM categories WHERE user_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001' AND name = '{{ $json.body.category || "General" }}'),
        {{ $json.body.external_calendar_id ? "'" + $json.body.external_calendar_id + "'" : "NULL" }})
RETURNING id, title, start_time, end_time;
